channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Mutant Marijuana’ Is Here —And It’s Changing How Weed Is Grown (But It’s Not What You Think)
item.description: Triploid cannabis may be the industry's next big shift, offering sterility, speed and potency, but raising new questions too.

item.title: Teva’s Layoffs Signal Deeper Fault Lines In The Pharmaceutical Business Model
item.description: Teva’s layoffs highlight a stark reality: generic drugs no longer offer a reliable path to growth in the U.S. market.
